task.summary:
Update-
I have changed the date to week number which i feel will be comfortable.
Reasons:
1.Our goal is more week so we interested in the week than the entire date 2.Now it must be easy to figure out in which we get christmas or other by just knowing the date of event

Figured out that temperature feature is only correlated for a very few departments and that too in only particular stores.
We can say that is not correlated completely or we can also add a rule that whenever that particular department of that stores needs a prediction we can include temperature to impprove accuracy of the prediction
I will also check the correlation with other features and let you know on that.

moved out all unwanted files as of now into the garbage folder. replaced the train with the csv file I showed to you, which is a mixture of historical features with train data. So accordingly i deleted some enum functions and other files from the oops_objects file. Please take a look at everything once

Sam,
Please download this into a different location as I have moved or deleted files from that you uploaded.
I moved on with the coding from your idea and implemented without using oops here, the code seems to work fine when under basic testing conditions where I have checked for one instance in non holiday and one instance in holiday.
What we need to figure out here more include primarly your idea of how to give the weights to the weeks based on how far they move away from the choosen week. I basically did this using just the average but code up in way so that we can still include this feature.
About the code:
I haved modified pickling functions. Now we have only 4 funtions for pickling(pickling primary,seconday, unpickling primary and secondary)
sales mapper code is newly added which maps the sales according to our discussion yesterday.
If any else is required we can finish it in the class
Weighted mapping update with minor errors
Fixed all errors and updated the coded to run for week window of range from 2 to 5
Fixed all errors and updated the coded to run for week window of range from 2 to 5
file and pickle to disk write error
update with comments in all files
weighting and other changes with minor math bug fixes
weighting and other changes with minor math bug fixes

MESSAGE.value:
Update-
I have changed the date to week number which i feel will be comfortable.
Reasons:
1.Our goal is more week so we interested in the week than the entire date 2.Now it must be easy to figure out in which we get christmas or other by just knowing the date of event

Figured out that temperature feature is only correlated for a very few departments and that too in only particular stores.
We can say that is not correlated completely or we can also add a rule that whenever that particular department of that stores needs a prediction we can include temperature to impprove accuracy of the prediction
I will also check the correlation with other features and let you know on that.

moved out all unwanted files as of now into the garbage folder. replaced the train with the csv file I showed to you, which is a mixture of historical features with train data. So accordingly i deleted some enum functions and other files from the oops_objects file. Please take a look at everything once

Sam,
Please download this into a different location as I have moved or deleted files from that you uploaded.
I moved on with the coding from your idea and implemented without using oops here, the code seems to work fine when under basic testing conditions where I have checked for one instance in non holiday and one instance in holiday.
What we need to figure out here more include primarly your idea of how to give the weights to the weeks based on how far they move away from the choosen week. I basically did this using just the average but code up in way so that we can still include this feature.
About the code:
I haved modified pickling functions. Now we have only 4 funtions for pickling(pickling primary,seconday, unpickling primary and secondary)
sales mapper code is newly added which maps the sales according to our discussion yesterday.
If any else is required we can finish it in the class
Weighted mapping update with minor errors
Fixed all errors and updated the coded to run for week window of range from 2 to 5
file and pickle to disk write error
update with comments in all files
weighting and other changes with minor math bug fixes
